mapper.select: select * from (select tour_board.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rn from tour_board) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into tour_board values(tourb_seq.nextval, 1, #{title}, #{contents}, #{category}, sysdate, default, default, default)
mapper.update: update tour_board set view_count = view_count + 1 where seq = #{seq}
update tour_board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, category=#{category} where seq = #{seq}
